name: Greedy Warehouse
description:
Greedy Warehouse
You own a warehouse and as a good businessman, you try to make money with it!
- Vendors give you goods
- You can sell the goods to earn points
- If you have enough points, a Vendor will upgrade giving you more goods!
- Profit!

Make sure that you don't run out of place or everyone will be upset and you can close the business... No profit... Big bad...

Tip: Vendors will give you a random number of goods between 1 and their level

--------------------------------

Credits:

Visual assets and audio by Kenney 
Font "Pulang" by Khurasan

Made for Trijam #181, theme: Storage management
